activities.name: Light Jogging
activities.description: A gentle jogging warm-up to prepare the body for physical activity
instructions: Start with slow walking for 1 minute
Gradually increase pace to light jogging
Maintain steady breathing throughout
Focus on proper running form
variations: Include side steps and backward jogging
Incorporate high knees and butt kicks
safetyNotes: Stop if experiencing pain or discomfort

activities.name: Dynamic Stretching
activities.description: A series of dynamic stretches to prepare muscles and joints for activity
instructions: Perform arm circles forward and backward (10 each)
Do leg swings front to back and side to side (10 each leg)
Execute walking lunges with torso twist (8 each leg)
Complete high knees and butt kicks (30 seconds each)
variations: Include ankle circles and calf raises
safetyNotes: Move through full range of motion gradually

activities.name: Basketball Dribbling Skills
activities.description: Practice fundamental basketball dribbling techniques and ball control
instructions: Start with stationary dribbling using dominant hand
Practice dribbling while walking in straight line
Add non-dominant hand dribbling
Practice crossover dribbling between cones
Combine with direction changes and speed variations
variations: Dribble with eyes closed for 10 seconds

activities.name: Capture the Flag
activities.description: Classic team strategy game focusing on teamwork and strategic thinking
instructions: Divide class into two equal teams
Set up boundaries and place flags at opposite ends
Explain rules: capture opponent's flag and return to home base
Players tagged in opponent territory go to 'jail'
Teammates can free jailed players by tagging them
safetyNotes: Have adult supervision in each territory

activities.name: Ultimate Frisbee
activities.description: Team sport combining elements of football and basketball using a frisbee
instructions: Set up end zones with cones
Teams score by catching frisbee in opponent's end zone
No running with frisbee - pivot foot only
Incomplete pass or interception changes possession
Play self-refereed with spirit of the game
safetyNotes: Proper throwing technique to avoid injury

activities.name: Soccer Passing and Receiving
activities.description: Fundamental soccer skills focusing on passing accuracy and ball reception
instructions: Partner up students 10 yards apart
Practice inside foot passing back and forth
Focus on proper plant foot placement
Receive ball with inside foot, cushioning touch
Gradually increase distance and pace
variations: Add cones as gates to pass through
safetyNotes: Watch for other players when chasing loose balls

activities.name: Cool Down Walk
activities.description: Gentle walking to gradually reduce heart rate after exercise
instructions: Start with slow walking pace
Focus on deep, controlled breathing
Gradually slow pace over 5 minutes
End with 1 minute of standing still
variations: Walk in different patterns (circle, line, etc.)
safetyNotes: Continue moving until heart rate normalizes

activities.name: Static Stretching
activities.description: Static stretches to improve flexibility and aid recovery
instructions: Hold each stretch for 15-30 seconds
Stretch major muscle groups used in activity
Breathe deeply and relax into each stretch
Include hamstring, quad, calf, and shoulder stretches
safetyNotes: Stretch should feel comfortable, not painful

activities.name: Modified Dodgeball
activities.description: Modified version of dodgeball emphasizing fun and inclusion
instructions: Use only foam balls for safety
Players hit below waist only
No throwing at head or face
Players return to game after 30 seconds out
Encourage teamwork and fair play

activities.name: Volleyball Serving
activities.description: Learning proper volleyball serving technique for underhand and overhand serves
instructions: Start with underhand serve technique
Practice toss and contact point
Focus on follow-through direction
Progress to overhand serve when ready
Practice serving to specific court zones
safetyNotes: Watch for other players when retrieving balls

activities.name: Kickball
activities.description: Classic playground game combining kicking skills with baseball strategy
instructions: Set up diamond with bases 60 feet apart
Pitcher rolls ball slowly to kicker
Kicker attempts to kick and run bases
Fielders catch or field ball to make outs
Three outs per inning, rotate teams
safetyNotes: Use proper kickball, not soccer ball

activities.name: Track Running Techniques
activities.description: Proper running techniques for track and field events
instructions: Practice proper running posture and arm swing
Work on breathing rhythm and pace
Practice starts and acceleration
Focus on stride length and frequency
Cool down with walking and stretching

activities.name: Floor Hockey
activities.description: Indoor hockey game focusing on stick handling and team play
instructions: Divide into teams of 5-6 players
Practice basic stick handling and passing
Play short scrimmage games
Emphasize passing and teamwork
Rotate players regularly
safetyNotes: Keep sticks low at all times

activities.name: Basic Gymnastics
activities.description: Introduction to basic gymnastics movements and body control
instructions: Practice forward and backward rolls
Work on handstands against wall
Practice cartwheels with proper form
Balance activities on one foot
Cool down with flexibility stretches

activities.name: Dance Warm-up
instructions: Start with simple step-touch movements
Add arm movements and gestures
Include level changes (high, middle, low)
Build intensity gradually
End with full-body movement
